DataElement.preferredName: Patient Medical History Amenable Consolidation Immunotherapy Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether patient has medial history amenable for treatment with consolidation immunotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Personal Medical History Amenable Consolidation Immunotherapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Having the appropriate qualities._Immunotherapy treatment that is given after initial therapy to kill any remaining cancer cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having the appropriate qualities._Immunotherapy treatment that is given after initial therapy to kill any remaining cancer cells.

Concepts.definition: Immunotherapy treatment that is given after initial therapy to kill any remaining cancer cells.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Response of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/15/08 - Associated NCIt concets for Yes/No instead of Meta.  Superceded existing VD.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have medical history consistent with the patient being amenable, at the discretion of the treating physician, to allow for treating with consolidation immunotherapy?
